name: Blood Vines
description:
how to play.

score points before the bar runs out.

you loose points and time for wrong answers.

arrow keys are used to match what vine directions are in bottom right (under the restart instructions)

use the A key for flowers in the upper left or lower right of the key.

use the S key for flowers in the upper right or lower left of the key.

use the A key for leafs in the upper right or lower left of the key.

use the S key for leafs in the upper left or lower right of the key.

space restart the game.
